results.title: Long-acting PGE2 and Lisinopril Mitigate H-ARS.
results.text_hl: Here, we tested a combination therapy of dmPGE2 and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ to mitigate @<m>DISEASE_Thrombocytopenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013921 @@@thrombocytopenia@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ models of @DISEASE_Acute_Radiation_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054508 @@@H-ARS@@@ following @DISEASE_Sialadenitis @DISEASE_MESH:D012793 @@@TBI@@@.

citations.NLM: Saunders J, Niswander LM, McGrath KE, Koniski A, Catherman SC, Ture SK, Medhora M, Kingsley PD, Calvi LM, Williams JP, Morrell CN, Palis J. Long-acting PGE2 and Lisinopril Mitigate H-ARS. Radiat Res. 2021 Sep 1;196(3):284-296. PMID: 34153091
